message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this valuable product for $11,500. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can offer you $11,000 for it. This aligns better with my budget. I look forward to your response.

Bob, I understand your position, but $11,000 is a little too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,250. This reflects the value of the product and allows for some wiggle room for both of us. Let's try to close this deal.
